issue.title: Reduce lock contention in Thread.getAndClearInterrupt

repository.name: openj9-openjdk-jdk
repository.description: Extensions for OpenJDK for Eclipse OpenJ9

issue.body:
Lock contention in `Thread.getAndClearInterrupt` is reduced by
acquiring the lock only when the value of the `Thread.interrupted`
field is `true`.

Related: https://github.com/eclipse-openj9/openj9/issues/20414

issue.title: [JDK24] Find and consume --illegal-native-access=<VALUE>

repository.name: openj9
repository.description: Eclipse OpenJ9: A Java Virtual Machine for OpenJDK that's optimized for small footprint, fast start-up, and high throughput.   Builds on Eclipse OMR (https://github.com/eclipse/omr) and combines with the Extensions for OpenJDK for OpenJ9 repo.

issue.body:
After reading the last `--illegal-native-access=<VALUE>` option,
the system property `jdk.module.illegal.native.access` is assigned
the specified `<VALUE>`.

Related: #19680
Related: #20354

issue.title: [JDK24] Add native access checks in System.load/loadLibrary

repository.name: openj9
repository.description: Eclipse OpenJ9: A Java Virtual Machine for OpenJDK that's optimized for small footprint, fast start-up, and high throughput.   Builds on Eclipse OMR (https://github.com/eclipse/omr) and combines with the Extensions for OpenJDK for OpenJ9 repo.

issue.body:
Add native access checks in `System.load/loadLibrary` to comply with
JEP472 (Prepare to Restrict the Use of JNI).

Related: #19680
Related: #20354

issue.title: Update ClassLoader.findNative to support JEP 472

repository.name: openj9
repository.description: Eclipse OpenJ9: A Java Virtual Machine for OpenJDK that's optimized for small footprint, fast start-up, and high throughput.   Builds on Eclipse OMR (https://github.com/eclipse/omr) and combines with the Extensions for OpenJDK for OpenJ9 repo.

issue.body:
A new version of `ClassLoader.findNative` has been introduced, which
accepts the Java method name and the Java class where the native
method is declared as input parameters. It performs native access
checks to comply with JEP 472 (Prepare to Restrict the Use of JNI).

Related: #19680
Related: #20354
